dt.patient:
SELECT
	patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.gender:
SELECT
	concept_cd	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_gender",
patient_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'DEM|GESCHLECHT%'
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.zipcode:
SELECT
	patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value",
zip_cd	AS	"patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.birthdate:
SELECT
	birth_date	AS	"patient_birthDate",
patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.encounter:
SELECT
	encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	patient_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension
WHERE
	visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	encounter_num;
dt.encounterstart:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.start_date::date	AS	"encounter_period_start"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, start_date
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension) AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.encounterend:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.end_date::date	AS	"encounter_period_end"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, end_date
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension) AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.ageindays:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.nval_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_age_days"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'DEM|AUFNAHMEALTERTAGE%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.ageinyears:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.nval_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_age_years"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'DEM|AUFNAHMEALTERJAHRE%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.admission:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.concept_cd	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_admitSource"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'FALL|AUFNAHMEANLASS%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.hospitalization:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.concept_cd	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_class"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'FALL|AUFNAHMEGRUND%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.discharge:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
	a.concept_cd	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_dischargeDisposition"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'FALL|ENTLASSGRUND%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.ventilation:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
	a.nval_num	AS	"observation_code_coding_code"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'LOINC:74201-5') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.condition_principal:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
	a.concept_cd	AS	"condition_code_coding_code"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'ICD%' AND modifier_cd = 'DIAGNOSEART:HD' AND observation_blob NOT LIKE 'Code 2 from%'
) AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.conditioncategory:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
	a.modifier_cd	AS	"encounter_diagnosis_rank"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, modifier_cd
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'ICD%' AND observation_blob NOT LIKE 'Code 2 from%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.condition_secondary:
SELECT
	b.encounter_num	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
	a.concept_cd	AS	"condition_code_coding_code_rank2"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
	encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'ICD%' AND modifier_cd = 'DIAGNOSEART:ND' AND observation_blob NOT LIKE 'Code 2 from%') AS a ON
	a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
WHERE
	b.visit_blob = 'True encounter'
ORDER BY
	b.encounter_num;
dt.procedure:
SELECT
	encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
	concept_cd	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'OPS%'
ORDER BY
	encounter_num;
dt.proceduredate:
SELECT
	encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
	start_date::date	AS	"procedure_performedDateTime"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'OPS%'
ORDER BY
	encounter_num;
dt.procedure_medication:
SELECT
	encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
	concept_cd	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'OPS:6-00%'
ORDER BY
	encounter_num;
dt.laboratory:
SELECT
	concept_cd	AS	"observation_code_coding_code",
encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
	concept_cd LIKE 'LOINC%';
